attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was stabbed in August 2006 and was nearly killed. The police caught the assailant with the weapon shortly after the attack.  I have tried for 8 months to find out what's happening but the police have not told me any information at all.  However, I watch the news and Mr Blair claims the governmetn are tough on knife crime.  Tony you are a liar my friend

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
